DOC.brief_summary: This multi-center , open-label , study evaluate safety efficacy ublituximab ( TG-1101 ) combination TGR-1202 patient progressed treatment arm previously enrol Protocol UTX-TGR-304
DOC.brief_title: An Open-Label Study Evaluate Safety Efficacy Ublituximab Combination With TGR-1202 Patients Previously Enrolled Protocol UTX-TGR-304
DOC.criteria: Prior treatment clinical trial UTXTGR304 Eastern Cooperative Oncology Group ( ECOG ) score 0 2 Patients refractory ublituximab + TGR1202 Transformation CLL aggressive NonHodgkin 's Lymphoma ( NHL ) ( Richter 's transformation )
